ygData.subject: Re: Flight Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Originally it was intended for wizards to fly. Yes fly,not levitate. Unfortunatly it was very hard to implement and was very buggy,verant just not been
ygData.messageBody:
Robin McCaig wrote:
>
> From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>
> I read on a Eq Info Site about the LvL 20 Flight Spell available to wizards.
> Has anyone heard or seen this spell? If so give me details about it.


Originally it was intended for wizards to fly. Yes fly,not levitate.

Unfortunatly it was very hard to implement and was very buggy,verant
just not been able to squash all the bugs associated with flight.
So it got warped to levitate.
Eq dev team just dragging their feet and havent bothered to change the
name of flight to what it actually has become: levitate.

If u have the extra runes to burn it is researchable, or else u can buy
it from a druid spell merchant.


Bull
